snippet: Rafael Nadal continued to storm through the draw, defeating the Argentine qualifier Eduardo Schwank, 6-1, 6-3, 6-4, in the third round and will face Juan Monaco next.
abstract: Defending champion Rafael Nadal continues to storm through the men's draw at the French Open, defeating the Argentine qualifier Eduardo Schwank in the third round.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal continued to storm through the draw, defeating the Argentine qualifier Eduardo Schwank, 6-1, 6-3, 6-4, in the third round and will face Juan Monaco next.

headline.seo: For Nadal, a Stroll to a Victory; for His Next Opponent, a Marathon
headline.main: For Nadal, a Stroll to a Victory; for His Next Opponent, a Marathon
headline.print_headline: For Nadal, a Stroll to a Victory; for His Next Opponent, a Marathon
